body.p: This day came his Excellency Beriah Magoffin & Messrs Samuel Gill, George T. Wood, & General Peter Dudley before me the Clerk of the Court of Appeals and made oath that they would faithfully execute the provisions of An Act of the Legislature of Kentucky approved May 24 1861 entitled "An Act for the regulation of the Militia and to provide for the arming of the State."

Witness my hand May 31st 1861.
Leslie Combs
C. C. A.
